
---
title: '生物名称翻译2_ 请您来取名？'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 科学网
 - 博客
headimg: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202205/19/133433ibv0adoozdda2lkv.jpg'
author: 科学网
comments: false
date: Thu, 19 May 2022 13:35:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202205/19/133433ibv0adoozdda2lkv.jpg'
---

<div>   
<p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 18px;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", "serif";"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">科普图书的外文表达一般比较简明，翻译看似简单，但想翻好却不易，需要查很多资料，也是费时费力的活。</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'"> </span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">有本科普书在讲到放牧的影响时提到，</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">19</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">世纪末美国西部牧场的牲畜数量迅速增加，牲畜的啃食助长了一种有毒植物地洞草的蔓延。地洞草一名比较特别，在工具书和网络上均查不到，核对原文才知道是</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">burrow-weed</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">被译为地洞草。</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'"> </span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">在很多词典上也查不到</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">burrow-weed</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">一词，但从一个专业网站上查到，</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">burrow-weed</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">又称</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">rayless goldenrod</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">，学名是</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">Haplopappus heterophyllus</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">，有个异名</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">Isocoma wrightii</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">。查数据库，没找到学名对应的中名。</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'"> </span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">goldenrod</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">多指菊科一枝黄花属（</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">Solidago</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">）植物，</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">rayless goldenrod</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">属名与前者不同，显然不是该属的植物。可喜的是从专业网站上查到了</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">Haplopappus</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">中名是单冠菊属、</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">Isocoma</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">中名是无舌黄菀属，种加词</span><em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">heterophyllus</span></em><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">意思是具异形叶的的<em>，</em>而</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">rayless</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">的意思应该是无舌状花的，故英文名</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">rayless goldenrod</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">对应的中文俗名可以译为</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">“</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">无舌一枝黄花</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">”</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">，而中名似可以确定为</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">“</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">无舌单冠菊</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'">”</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">。是否妥当？烦请专业人士指教。</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'"> </span></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:宋体">该植物是一种开黄花的多年生小灌木，常生长在美国德克萨斯州、亚利桑那州和墨西哥北部的开阔盐碱地。鲜、干植物均有毒，马、牛、绵羊和山羊等误食可引起中毒，母畜可以通过乳汁将毒素传给幼畜。研究表明，该毒素主要损伤心肌。</span></p><p><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:'Times New Roman','serif'"> </span></p><p><img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202205/19/133433ibv0adoozdda2lkv.jpg" title alt="burrow-weed-poisoning.jpg" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></p><p style="line-height: 1.5em;"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></span><br></p><p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:宋体"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family:宋体"></span></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt width="183" height="184" style="overflow-wrap: break-word; max-width: 620px; width: 183px; height: 184px; float: left; display: block;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 21px;"><br></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 21px;"><br></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 21px;"><br></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 21px;"><br></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", "serif"; font-size: 16px;"> </span></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p style="overflow-wrap: break-word; margin-top: 1.12em; margin-bottom: 1.12em; padding: 0px; font-family: Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif, Hei; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: normal;"><br></p>
